summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's Intense Overnight Sleeping Cream is formulated with nutrient-rich ingredients and lipids to deliver essential moisture while you sleep. Formulated with plant squalane, kakadu plum and a specialized blend of plant-based triglycerides.
details: DetailsBenefitsA rich, intensive cream that transforms skin while you sleepFormulated with plant squalane, kakadu plum and a specialized blend of plant-based triglycerides, it locks in hydration for visibly brighter and plumper skinDermatologist testedVegan, paraben & cruelty freeFeaturesIntense Overnight Sleeping Cream is formulated to lock in skin care while you sleep, so you wake up feeling refreshed and glowing - your skin is more permeable at night and can better absorb active ingredients during that timeKey IngredientsPlant Squalane: helps balance skin, works to improve skin suppleness and adds weightless hydrationKakadu Plum: helps provide a brighter appearance, works to even look of skin tone & texture, and protects the skin from environmental stressorsPlant-Based Triglycerides Blend: softens & smooths skin and locks in moistureItem 2627351How To UseAs the last step in your evening skincare routine, apply a generous layer onto skin and leave on overnight. Wash thoroughly in the morning. Use 2-3 times a week or as needed.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsAqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Squalane, Propanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Glycolipids, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycine Soja Sterols, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Betaine, Potassium Sorbate, Polysorbate 20, Hexylene Glycol.
how_to_use: As the last step in your evening skincare routine, apply a generous layer onto skin and leave on overnight. Wash thoroughly in the morning. Use 2-3 times a week or as needed.For external use only. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Best cream ever
reviews.comments: This cream is the best my skin is so soft when I wake up instant results

reviews.headline: Rubber consistency
reviews.comments: I bought this and returned for having a rubbery texture. Ordered a jar online and had the same issue. I will not be trying it a third time. So disappointing and sounds like lots of others have same experience.

reviews.headline: Best Overnight Moisturizer
reviews.comments: It was really surprised how creamy and smooth this product was. It did not give me a greasy cast on my face, and when I woke up in the morning, my face was soft and hydrated and felt so amazing.

reviews.headline: texture issues
reviews.comments:
maybe i just got a bad batch, but the texture was really clumpy, almost putty-like. You can massage it into skin and get an okay moisturizer, but I don't think my skin was really benefiting much, and the experience is a little sad. It's been like this since I received it months ago, and I haven't been able to bring myself to finish it. 
Naturium's multi-peptide moisturizer honestly feels more nourishing, but for a real sleeping cream, I'm looking somewhere else.

reviews.headline: Not the same
reviews.comments: From day one of the die hard fan that went through about six cities the last two I had it's very cottage cheese clumpy looking I don't know what happened I know they sold the company I guess they didn't keep the same formula.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I've got dry skin and this has been the best moisturizer I've tried. Yes, it's very thick and clumpy in the jar but it smooths out just fine on your hands and face. My skin feels fantastic the next morning.

reviews.headline: Does not moisturize
reviews.comments: the texture is so off you can make like a ball when you scoop it out and it is so stiff it will stay there. it doesn't moisturize or hydrate it literally stays on top of the skin.

reviews.headline: Good daily moisturizer for DRY skin
reviews.comments: I have DRY sensitive, red, itchy eczema skin. This is the first thing I've found so far that soothes, moisturizes and keeps my skin moisturzed all day. Great stuff!

reviews.headline: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comments: As a side sleeper who gets sleep wrinkles on kynforehwad i was lookingnfor a rhick overnight cream i could apply that would bind good enough to hekp me prevent sleep wrinkles…this stuff so far is the best product i have found.  It is not a moisturizer ad much as a rhuck creamy mask that improves your skin.

reviews.headline: Weird texture
reviews.comments: I didn't love this product. I am a big naturium fan and use a lot of their other products. This cream had a rubbery texture, chunky and you really have to work it out to make it creamy enough to put on your face. Not elegant, just weird.

reviews.headline: Not for oily dry combo skin
reviews.comments: Tried to love this product for the past 3 months but every time I use it I break out in horrible cystic acne that clears up a week after I stop using this cream. It also feels heavy and clogging not like other over night masks, it activly feels like my skin is suffocating while using this. Overall do not recommend considering the price and the simple fact that it does not hydrate my skin at all. Will be theowing out.

reviews.headline: Clogged my pores :(
reviews.comments: I've been in search of a night cream that's acne friendly so I gave this cream a shot. This cream has a chunky texture which I thought was weird at first, but I rubbed it in between my hands which smoothed it out then applied it to my face. The cream definitely left my skin super soft and hydrated when I woke up in the morning, but after 2 weeks of using it, I noticed a bunch of clogged pores all over my chin :( I have acne prone skin so I wouldn't say this cream is acne friendly.

reviews.headline: Very Hydrating Clean Overnight Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have come to love the Naturium brand ever since I received one of their products in a monthly subscription box. Naturium products a high quality clean products that actually deliver results. The proce point is very good and their products work just as well as higher price point products, so when I needed a nighttime moisturizer that was clean, result oriented, and reasonablly priced, I turned to Naturium. I was not disappointed! Their Intense overnight Cream is extremely hydrating and it sinks right into your skin. I have very dry skin and this product delivered real results for me. My skin does ot feel tight or look flakey when I wake up. It looks glowey andhydrated. Another great product from Naturium!

reviews.headline: Amazing cream
reviews.comments: I use many of the items in this line and I love them all. I have tried dozens of high-end skin care with high price tags and nothing works as well or makes my skin as soft as this line does and for half the price or less. I am so thankful I found this skin care line and I hope Ulta will never stop carrying it because I'll be a forever customer. I'm 67 and my skin is as soft as babies skin! I couldn't be more pleased!

reviews.headline: Loved this until..
reviews.comments: I really loved how this product made my skin look the next morning, however, there are not so great ingredients included in their formula. Check the Yuka app. The packaging is also terrible. The plastic lid is prone to cracking which causes the lotion to dry out.

reviews.headline: Super Hydrating
reviews.comments: Made my skin very smooth, soft, and hydrated in the morning. It's perfect.

reviews.headline: I must have gotten a bad one!
reviews.comments: Mine is a solid and not creamy. I have to scrape it out of the jar, rub it between my fingers and it still doesn't glide across my skin. I am so bummed because i waited too long to try it so I don't think i can exchange it. Very sad!

reviews.headline: Perfect night cream
reviews.comments: This product is amazing. Its nice and thick, soaks into the skin quickly, and does not leave a greasy feeling. I have even gone without washing my face in the morning and have had no issues at all, which is saying alot for my super sensitive skin. If you have really dry skin, give this a try, you will not be dissatisfied.

reviews.headline: High quality without the price tag
reviews.comments: This is very moisturizing and not greasy. I have tried many moisturizers from Dermalogica to LeMer and I would say this does job and so convenient to take with me when I travel.

reviews.headline: Not as expected
reviews.comments: This is a really thick paste that is hard to rub in. It doesn't really moisturize or sink in, just sits on top of skin.

media.headline: Great for locking in nightly skincare or slugging
media.caption: Comparison between ceramide and night cream.

media.headline: Great for locking in nightly skincare or slugging
media.caption: Night cream thicker than a snicker!

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this each night to lock everything in. I have combo skin so I don't like to slug but this is perfect for that. It's scent free,  no irritation or breakouts. The consistency is THICK. A little goes a long way. It's like a hybrid of a thick cream and balm.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for locking in nightly skincare or slugging

faceoff_negative.comments: I started buying Naturium products about 6 months ago and am growing to really love the brand. I have dry, very sensitive skin and appreciate all the options for my skin type. I have been using this cream for several months, every single night, and have gone through at least 5 jars. I loved it. I just started using my latest jar with the new vegan formula. The consistency is just…off. The old formula was rich and creamy. The new formula is clumpy, somewhat like homemade play-doh. It comes out of the jar in gelatinous clumps, nothing like the original creamy consistency. Product still performs ok, less hydrating than the original. I also have to take much more time working it in my skin since it is so clumpy, which then irritates my reactive skin. Just a very strange consistency unlike any other face cream, not in a good way. Original cream was 5 stars…
faceoff_negative.headline: New strange consistency
